game.name: Limbot
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Limbot은 거대한 골판지 로봇 복장을 한 사람의 팔다리를 조종하는, 한껏 우스꽝스러운 물리 기반 게임입니다! 혼자서 네 개의 팔다리를 전부 마스터하거나, 소파에 둘러앉아 친구들과 함께 이 완전히 파괴 가능한 골판지 세계의 혼돈과 끈끈한 팀워크를 즐겨 보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Limbot is a super silly, physics-driven game about controlling the limbs of a person dressed as a giant cardboard robot! Master all four limbs in solo or embrace the chaos (and camaraderie) of couch co-op play, in this fully destructible cardboard world!
